Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (7,-6).
formula: a(n)=(4/5)*(2+3*6^n), with n>=0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 25 2008G.f.: ( 4-12*x ) / ( (6*x-1)*(x-1) ). - _Simon Plouffe_ in his 1992 dissertation.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Mar 27 2010
